title: Amazing Location! Next to Shopping Center, Brewery, AMC Theater!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 101', 'OR Text', '101', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1064 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Arbour Square!', 'Our community is perfectly situated for the exhilarating Colorado lifestyle our residents deserve.', 'Adjacent to the community is The Orchard Town Center, with its REI, for outdoor gear needs, an AMC, for weekend entertainment, and a Menchie’s Frozen Yogurt, which may become an everyday stop.', 'For our nature lovers, the Todd Creek Golf Course is a quick fifteen-minute drive away, and the Barr Lake State Park is a thirty-minute drive, but that’s just the location!', 'Step into our studio, one-, two-, or three-bedroom apartment homes to see a gourmet kitchen with pendulum lighting and granite countertops.', 'Our interiors also feature walk-in closets and double-vanity bathrooms.', 'While living at our community, you’ll find yourself enjoying the community sky lounge following a few dozen swings in the golf simulator.', 'You may even want to roast a few marshmallows with friends at the outdoor fireplace.', 'Features:', 'Patios/Balconies*, Track and Pendulum Lighting, Granite Countertops, Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details., Spectacular Mountain Views*, Gourmet Kitchens with Stainless-steel Appliances, Double Vanity Bathrooms, In-home Washer and Dryer, Walk-in Closets', 'Community Amenities:', 'Swimming Pool, Golf Simulator, LEED Certified Building, Garages and Underground Parking, Theater Room, Smoke-free Community, Deluxe Fitness Center, Sky Lounge with Panoramic Views, Demonstration Kitchen, Outdoor Fireplace and Lounge with Barbecue Kitchen, 8, 000 sq.ft.', 'Welcome Center, Cybercafé and Conference Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets are welcome!', 'Please consult with the onsite team for additional breed or animal type restrictions.', '$35/month pet rent per pet & $300 non-refundable fee per pet (due at move-in)', 'Pet Screening profile required for each pet at time of application for approval ($20 fee per pet)', 'The following breeds are restricted from this community.', 'Snakes and birds are not permitted.', '*These restrictions and deposit requirements do not apply to qualified assistance animals.*', 'Pit Bull Terriers/Staffordshire Terriers', 'Rottweilers', 'Doberman Pinschers', 'Chows', 'Akitas', 'Presa Canarios', 'Alaskan Malamutes', 'Wolf-hybrids', 'Income Requirements:', 'Must provide proof of income that shows 3x rent', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', '61rJkEmCiqa']
